title: Coronavirus: Pandemic is 'accelerating', WHO warns as cases pass 300,000
description: More than 300,000 cases have now been reported, as Covid-19 spreads to almost every country.
content:
Image copyrightAFPImage caption
 The WHO chief urged the G20 group of nations to boost production of protective equipment
The World Health Organization (WHO) has warned that the coronavirus disease pandemic is "accelerating", with more than 300,000 cases no… [+2153 chars]
